spacecraft.name: Vikram Lander
spacecraft.description: India's first soft-lander on the Moon. Successfully landed near the south pole in 2023.

spacecraft.name: Apollo Lunar Module
spacecraft.description: The iconic Eagle. Carried 12 astronauts to the lunar surface between 1969-1972.

spacecraft.name: Curiosity Rover
spacecraft.description: Car-sized rover using Sky Crane system. Still operational after 12+ years on Mars.

spacecraft.name: Perseverance Rover
spacecraft.description: Latest Mars rover. Collecting samples for future Earth return, deployed Ingenuity helicopter.

spacecraft.name: Falcon 9 Booster
spacecraft.description: Revolutionary reusable first-stage booster. Over 200 successful landings as of 2024.

spacecraft.name: Starship Super Heavy
spacecraft.description: Largest rocket ever built. Fully reusable, designed for Moon and Mars missions.

spacecraft.name: Huygens Probe
spacecraft.description: Parachuted through Titan's thick atmosphere. Transmitted for 72 minutes after landing.

spacecraft.name: Hayabusa2
spacecraft.description: Touch-and-go sample return mission. Collected material from Ryugu and returned to Earth in 2020.

spacecraft.name: Venera 7
spacecraft.description: First spacecraft to return data from another planet's surface. Survived 23 minutes on Venus.
